Detailed Description

Message Handler

This class serves as the main API for clients.

void MsgHandler::registerType ( msg_type  type,
msg_type_text  ttype,
const char *  signature 
)

Registers a message type

The parameter ttype corresponds to the ATOM element in string format.

Parameters:
type msg_type (an integer identifier)
ttype text string corresponding to msg_type
signature (combination of [A|L|S|D])
